title: RED: sdk-client-test - Tests for ClaudeClient
close_reason: ClaudeClient tests are complete and passing. Factory functions createRpcSession and newWebSocketRpcSession included.

title: RED: sdk-types-test - Tests for SDK types
close_reason: SDK types tests are complete and passing. Found 22 tests in /packages/sdk/src/types/index.test.ts covering Session, Message, ContentBlock, FileNode, FileDiff, StreamEvent, ClaudeConfig, ServerConfig, and ApiError types.

title: GREEN: sdk-client-impl - Implement ClaudeClient
close_reason: ClaudeClient is fully implemented in /packages/sdk/src/client/index.ts with session management (createSession, getSession, resumeSession, listSessions, destroySession), messaging (sendMessage, query), callbacks (StreamCallbackHandler), and connection handling. Supports WebSocket and HTTP transports via capnweb.

title: RED: rpc-client-test - Tests for capnweb RPC client
close_reason: Client tests complete: 20 passing tests in index.test.ts covering RpcTarget, RpcSession state management, connect/disconnect, getStub, RPC calls (send/receive), error handling, state change subscription, message subscription, send method, createRpcSession and newWebSocketRpcSession factories.

title: REFACTOR: sdk-exports - Clean up SDK exports
close_reason: SDK exports are clean and well-organized in /packages/sdk/src/index.ts. Exports are grouped into: types (from ./types/index.js), client (ClaudeClient, createClaudeClient), server helpers (ClaudeCode, getSandbox, etc.), RPC helpers (RpcTarget, RpcSession, etc.), event emitter, and terminal proxy.
